name: (PvP) Gladiators
author: Haiaen
notes:
I feel GBs are exceptional now - super crazy presence on the board with backrown and extreme utiliy (Besti / Merman). 
Double WoD to deal with the increase in Hazy - which worked a treat. Went 14-1 to hit KoG with this deck specifically. 
Real MVPs - Gyokku and Batman - Won me so many games by locking down backrow / Negating card effects during battle.

Oh... And Balance is OP - Plz Nerf
